views.markdown:
- Verified compatibility for iOS 8, 9 and 10 - Removed black picker views
Fixed an issue where text in pickerviews was black, we partially fixed this, some devices may have half white half black text.

Fixed issue where Picker View had white on white text and background -Fixed a bug where done button and chevrons where white in safari and other apps. -Fixed a bug where upon installation the Enabled Switch would show as enabled but was actually disabled.
-Improved stability specifically in settings.
Fixed a bug causing the pickerView in mail to be white with black text instead of black with white text * Fixed bug where text in the From: field email selector in Mail would be white
* Fixed bug where buttons other than the chevrons and Done button would be white * Fixed bug where blue text would sometimes be white
* Fixed bug where pickerviews had dark backgrounds
* Added new flipswitch
-Fixed bug where buttons where white after a pickerView was shown
-Fixed bug that caused the picker view background to soemtimes be white
-Added IRC contact us method to preferences

-Fixed bug which caused white buttons after a picker view was shown * Picker entries are now white
* Chevrons and done button are white
* Dark PIN keyboard in Settings > General > Passcode
- Now works in Safari, Mail, and on the lock screen with alphanumeric passcodes
